articles.description: BBC Sport has asked a number of experts to predict their Champions League winners, a surprise package and which player excites them the most.
articles.title: Champions League: Aston Villa, Arsenal, Liverpool, Real Madrid, Man City, Celtic, Barcelona, Bayern Munich - who will win?

articles.description: Anthony Joshua says he has "been through a lot of pain" over the past two years as he bids to become a three-time world champion against fellow British heavyweight Daniel Dubois on Saturday.
articles.title: Anthony Joshua vs Daniel Dubois: Joshua says he has "been through a lot of pain" on journey to world-title shot

articles.description: Manchester United manager Erik ten Hag says Brazil winger Antony must "earn the right" to play.
articles.title: Man Utd: Antony must earn right to play - Erik ten Hag

articles.description: BBC Sport examines how the allure of Real Madrid has enabled them to assemble a new team of young "Galacticos", as the Champions League holders aim to win a record-extending 16th European crown.
articles.title: Real Madrid: How Champions League holders built new Galacticos team

articles.description: World Athletics president Lord Coe has been named as one of seven confirmed candidates to succeed Thomas Bach as  International Olympic Committee (IOC) president.
articles.title: Lord Coe among seven candidates to be new IOC president

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Young Boys vs Aston Villa in the UEFA Champions League
articles.title: Young Boys vs Aston Villa: UEFA Champions League - BBC Sport

articles.description: The hearing into Manchester City's 115 charges for alleged breaches of the Premier League's financial rules begins on Monday.
articles.title: Man City hearing: Premier League 115 charges case begins

articles.description: Liverpool goalkeeper Alisson Becker says players are not being listened to about workloads and warns that no stakeholders are close to a solution.
articles.title: Liverpool goalkeeper Alisson says 'Nobody asks players about adding more games'

articles.description: BBC Sport's golf correspondent Iain Carter looks at the finer details behind the United States' triumph in the 2024 Solheim Cup
articles.title: Solheim Cup 2024: 'United States won thanks to captaincy commodities'

articles.description: A Sunday of upsets saw the Saints batter the Cowboys, Raiders stun the Ravens and Vikings stifle the 49ers.
articles.title: NFL results & Week Two recap: Ravens, Cowboys & 49ers stunned by Raiders, Saints, Vikings
